summary: A different colour for the Dragonscale-Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Since my first Retex was pretty well I decided to make different styles of it and upload them one after another.

This time it\'s a green version like made from a \"Swamp-Dragon\", I hope you like it.

Installation:
Put the unzipped folder to your ..\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor folder.
(If it doesn\'t exist - create it!)

Uninstall:
Delete or rename the folder.

My other Retexes for Dragonscale:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2023 (Bloody / Red Style)
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2487 (Icy Blue Style)
author: Benden1985
